Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      orbotix.robot.base.Robot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sphero
public class Robot
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Closeable

An available robotic device.

public long getTimeOffset()
Accessor to the time offset between time returned by SystemClock's uptimeMillis() method and the robot's clock.

Returns:
A time offset in millis that converts the robot's clock to the systems uptime clock.

public int getColor()
Get the current color of the ball. This returns the last color that was successfully sent to the robot.

Returns:
an integer representation of color.
